template.description: Property bag for match type buttons for frontend multiplayer menu. This has a list of possible match types and a set of conditions for each.

group.name: match_type_button_bag
group.description: List of match types and conditions

list.name: match_types
list.description: List of match types and conditions

string.name: page_transition
string.description: Xaml to load if this button is clicked

file.name: image_large
file.description: The largest image to use when displaying this button

file.name: image_small
file.description: The smallest image to use when displaying this button

file.name: image_medium
file.description: The mid-sized image to when displaying this button

string.name: page_category
string.description: What category does the new page fall under

string.name: datatemplate
string.description: Data template for display purposes or distinguishing different types of buttons from each other.

file.name: image_background
file.description: An image to use as a button background

locstring.name: tooltip_about
locstring.description: Description of the MenuTile displayed in tooltip

locstring.name: tooltip_config_player_count
locstring.description: This is displayed in the tooltip for MenuTile under Configuration

locstring.name: tooltip_config_game_mode
locstring.description: This is displayed in the tooltip for MenuTile under Configuration

locstring.name: tooltip_config_maps
locstring.description: This is displayed in the tooltip for MenuTile under Configuration

string.name: custom_model_type
string.description: Use a custom model type in code that's derived from MenuTileElementModel.
